content.about: Memphis Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Memphis area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Patricia D.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Jennifer J.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Memphis Antique Appraisals's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: John W.
reviews.content: Memphis Antique Appraisals's knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Nancy A.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: James T.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Memphis provides professional antique appraisal services in the Memphis area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Sarah T.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Emily M.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Linda W.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.
